make sure your computer has enough space to install. Also make sure everything is compatible. WE suggest you format your partitions and install it on one. So it has all space to operate.

I ran the upgrade advisor and the only thing it pointed out is my printer.  I have four hard drives including one external.  The HD that I am trying to install it on has been formatted several times.  I have also trying deleting the partition and creating a new one and I have the same problem.  I am at a loss.
